summary: Intermittent test failure in test_metric_basics where expected metric count of 1 was receiving 2 instead. Root cause identified as OpenTelemetry metrics issue with incorrect attributes in Prometheus output.
userImpact: Tests occasionally fail intermittently in CI, reducing confidence in test suite reliability and blocking deployments.
rootCause: OpenTelemetry was putting strange metrics in Prometheus with incorrect attributes compared to what was recorded
workaround: Commenting out the problematic metric validation temporarily until OpenTelemetry upgrade
resolutionDetails: Issue resolved after Core upgrade; has not recurred since the upgrade
keyQuote: There is something strange with OTel where it is putting some strange metrics up in Prometheus that don't have the attributes right as we recorded.
